name: Black Bean Brownies
description: Flourless chocolaty brownies—black beans add moisture and fudgy texture. It’s your secret that they are gluten-free.
preparation: Place a lightly oiled Rectangular Steamer on a Sheet Pan.
Combine all ingredients in a food processor and mix until smooth.
Divide the batter into the Rectangular Steamer.
Bake for 20–25 minutes or until the edges start to pull away from the sides.
tips: For a speedier version of this recipe, simply add batter to a lightly oiled Rectangular Steamer and microwave, uncovered, for 5–8 minutes on high.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
